Azerbaijan accuses not the Armenian people but the Armenian government of committing the Khojaly genocide.
Armenia is accused of suffering a million refugees and internally displaced persons who have become refugees in their native lands.
In order to increase confidence and build cooperation between Armenia and Azerbaijan, the land should be liberated from occupation first of all.
